title: [管理]KickFromClaim——在GriefPrevention领地中踢出骚扰者！[1.12-1.13]
author: SHIMH
txt_content:
本帖最后由 SHIMH 于 2019-10-28 13:05 编辑 

KickFromClaim





image.png (262.26 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2019-10-27 12:39 上传




插件功能十分简单，功能就是将骚扰你的钉子户或在你领地里关了PVP挂机的玩家踢出去作者原文：We all know that one guy who outstays their welcome... The guy who just won't leave your base... But don't worry, we've got you covered.? Introducing the power of eleven secret Functions and Algorithms...? Straight up, this plugin is an extension for GriefPrevention. It won't work with WorldGuard, and you will need to have GriefPrevention installed. And yes, I do have to mention this...指令/限权  /kfc <player> 将玩家踢出领地     kickfromclaim.kick /petkick 打开宠物踢出模式 kickfromclaim.petkick/kfcr | /rkfc重载插件kickfromclaim.reload
kickfromclaim.exempt 防止被踢出领地支持原作者，请去原帖下载本人第一次转载，请大家多多包涵附上汉化配置（自己翻译的）







Settings.yml


2019-10-27 12:55 上传
点击文件名下载附件

replies.author: fancymimis
replies.txt_content:
Alpha-∞ 发表于 2019-10-27 14:04
授权不是必需的
但是2333标题不合格
也并不是没必要，主要是看作者有没有声明不能搬运到其他网站去，如果有声明不能搬运然后还私自搬过来也算剽窃了
